prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (feral beast-man:1.2), muscular physique, wild mane-like hair, aggressive snarling expression, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (mutated green skin texture with visible veins:1.2), (wet hair texture:1.1), source palette preservation, identical color matching, animalistic features, glowing electrical sparks, sharp claws, cinematic jungle lighting, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, (human face:1.4), (cute furry:1.5), smooth skin, airbrushed, low quality, too soft
